form.official-title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the City of Eunice, Louisiana, certain Federal land in Louisiana, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Save the Liberty Theatre Act of 2021.

paragraph.text: The term City means the City of Eunice, Louisiana.
The term map means the map entitled Jean Lafitte National Historical Park and Preserve, Proposed Boundary Revision and Disposal, numbered 467/168813, and dated December 2020.
The term Secretary means the Secretary of the Interior.

subsection.text: The Secretary shall convey to the City, by quitclaim deed and without consideration, all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to the parcels of land described in subsection (b).

The parcels of land referred to in subsection (a) are Lots 5 and 6, less the North 27 feet of Lot 5, Block 22, of the Original Townsite of Eunice, generally depicted as Proposed Disposal Area on the map.
The map shall be on file and available for public inspection in the appropriate offices of the National Park Service.
